name: RataSpace
description:
Introduction:

You are a rare form of life that lives on an asteroid, the asteroid is being invaded by humans only by the rare metals found there, will destroy your house if you do not kill.

How to play:

You have to hit the astronauts to remove them.

a shot and you're dead.

Controls:

Space: Boost

Mouse: Moving

Enter:Resume

Esc:Pasue

Left Click: MainMenu

Warrings

The game is hard.

Music by: bensound.com
